abilities.name: Heavy Caliber
abilities.details: While Jayce is stationary for more than a few seconds, he loads a powerful bullet.[n]The bullet enhances his next basic attack, allowing him to gain bonus [bf]range[/] and deals additional [ad]physical damage[/] (scaling with [ad]physical power[/]).

abilities.name: Rail Gun
abilities.details: Jayce begins charging his rifle, gaining increased range for Rail Gun, but rooting himself in the process.[n]Upon release, he fires a massive, high-velocity bolt in a long line, dealing [ad]physical damage[/] (scaling with [ad]physical power[/]) to all enemies hit, but the damage [db]decreases[/] by a percentage for every enemy it passes through.[n]If fully charged, the shot deals [bf]higher damage[/] and shreds the enemies' [db]physical resistance[/] by a small amount.

abilities.name: Ghost Wire
abilities.details: On first cast, Jayce attaches a small cloaking device to a terrain. On second cast, Jayce attaches a second device to another terrain.[n]Once both are set, an invisible wire connects them. If an enemy hero walks through the line, they are [db]revealed[/] and [db]rooted[/] for a few seconds.

abilities.name: Tactical Retreat
abilities.details: Jayce fires a low-caliber blank into the ground and uses the recoil to vault backward.[n]Enemies hit by the blank are dealt [ad]physical damage[/] (scaling with [ad]physical power[/]) and [db]slowed[/] for a short duration.

abilities.name: Final Execution
abilities.details: Jayce selects a target within massive range. After a short lock-on period where a laser sight becomes visible to the enemy, he fires a single blast of laser that reaches the end of the map.[n]All enemies in the line take [ad]physical damage[/] (scaling with [ad]physical power[/]).
